description: The function is vulnerable to Path Traversal (CWE-22) because it uses user-supplied input to construct a file path without properly validating or sanitizing it. This could allow an attacker to access, read, or modify files outside of the intended directory. It is also vulnerable to Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) (CWE-79) and Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) (CWE-352) due to improper handling of user-supplied input and lack of anti-CSRF tokens. Additionally, the function may expose sensitive information (CWE-200
